title: Synthetic Recap
body:
DALLAS (AP) – In the deafening silence of a road arena, with the game and a piece of history on the line, Glen Rice was the calmest man in the building.

In a breathtaking individual performance for the ages, Rice carried the Charlotte Hornets to a heart-stopping 94-92 victory over the Dallas Mavericks, pouring in a monumental 42 points and seizing the moment with icy precision.

From the opening tip, it was clear this was Rice’s night. The sweet-shooting forward was a marvel of efficiency, a flurry of jump shots and drives that the Mavericks simply had no answer for. He was a one-man offensive system, single-handedly outscoring entire stretches of the game for Dallas. While teammate Anthony Mason provided crucial support with 17 points, this was the Glen Rice Show, a virtuoso performance that etched his name into the franchise record books.

As the clock wound down in a frantic fourth quarter, the Mavericks scrambled to find any answer. But Rice, with the cool demeanor of an assassin, continued to find the bottom of the net. Each basket was a dagger, each free throw a nail in the coffin, as he systematically dismantled the Dallas defense.

The final horn sounded, cementing not just a hard-fought road win for the Hornets, but an iconic night for their superstar. On this night, in a 94-92 grind, Glen Rice didn't just beat the Mavericks; he authored a legendary chapter, a 42-point masterpiece that will be remembered as one of the greatest individual efforts in club history.
